alert.note: Alert for Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 3:59PM AKST until December 11 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SUNDAY TO 5 AM AKST MONDAY FROM SLEETMUTE EAST... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Visibility reduced to one half mile at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Northerly winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lower Kuskokwim Valley, from Sleetmute east. * WHEN...From 3 PM Sunday to 5 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will spread north from Bristol Bay Sunday evening. The heaviest snowfall amounts are currently expected for Lime Village, with lower amounts further west. Winds and snow intensity decrease Monday morning, ending the threat of half mile visibilities, though light snow will continue through at least Monday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
